meanings.sent1: The rufescent leaves of the maple tree glowed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her cheeks turned rufescent with embarrassment.
meanings.sent3: The rufescent sky at sunset painted a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent4: The rufescent horizon signaled the arrival of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The rufescent apple looked ripe and juicy.
